input.sentences: glad to get the photo with the location .
the blooms are not there yet .
output.sentences: This really neat spiral was one of the first things to catch my eye as I went wandering on my first day of travel!
I decided to be a bit more focused on the second day and catch the capital views with Grandma and Auntie.
I was interested in how well the gardens were, parks and cemetaries were maintained.
We stopped at one more historical site before heading back to eat dinner.
